Watch an Ad to support Vanish
Vanish needs the support of you, the users to help support our App. We request you to watch this quick video Ad before we process your delete request.
This Number is Not Registered on Vanish
We couldn\'t send a delete request as the number was not registered on Vanish. Consider sharing the App with the User to delete their number
Unable to Detect Country Code
We were unable to detect a country code for the above number, please manually choose a Country Code
Ready to Delete?
We are ready to send out your delete request, you will be notified once the deletion is complete.
Request Successfully Sent!
Your delete request has been successfully sent. You will be notified about the outcome when the user receives it.
Delete Request Already Sent
You have already sent a Delete Request to this Number. We\'ll notify you when your number has been Deleted from this User.
This is a Premium User

The requested number you were trying to delete was identified as Premium. Only other Premium users can delete their number from a Premium User\'s Device. Go Premium right now to send a Delete Request to this Number!
